ygData.subject: RE: Great post on item balancing (Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehehe!  That s great Sylly!  I often say /g Feel the burn! when I proc for 48. Crier
ygData.messageBody:
Hehehe! That's great Sylly! I often say "/g Feel the burn!" when I proc
for 48.

Crier


> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 3:50 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Great post on item balancing (Long)
>
>
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Well, I did not like the looks when I first saw one and now am
> only used to
> it. What I do like quite a bit is seeing "... brain begins to smolder..."
> and right before that "...hit for 48 non-melee damage..." Proc - baby -
> Proc! that's my Chant of Battle - hehe.
>
> Sylly.
>
> log file analysis shows Staff and Dirk yield more damage over all
> than Crys
> Blade and Dirk.
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rokenn Swiftsong [mailto:rokenn@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 3:38 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Great post on item balancing
> (Long)
>
> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> Right now I am using a Runed Falchion & a Black Enamalled
> Mace. This seems
> to dish out some respectable damage. I just can't bring
> myself to use the
> Ugly Stick :) Even though I got one last night in a free
> loot call, I
> promptly gave it to someone the helped kill the noble but
> did not get the
> looting rights.
>
> Rokenn
>
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> lol@... with the subject submissions.
>
